title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: 1. Cook spaghetti in boiling salted water until al dente. 2. Fry pancetta until crisp. 3. Whisk eggs and cheese together. 4. Drain pasta, mix with pancetta, then stir in egg mixture off the heat. 5. Season with black pepper and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: 1. Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. 2. Grill or bake chicken until charred. 3. Simmer tomato sauce with spices. 4. Add cream and cooked chicken. 5. Serve with rice or naan.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A quick and healthy mix of fresh vegetables stir-fried with soy sauce and garlic.
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (broccoli, carrots, bell peppers)
instructions: 1. Heat oil in a wok. 2. Add garlic and ginger, stir-fry for 30 seconds. 3. Add vegetables and cook until tender-crisp. 4. Stir in soy sauce. 5. Serve hot.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
